page.title: 07HILLTOP RIDING SCHOOL
page.content: I go riding on Thursdays from 7.30 till 8.30pm and it costs 1 pound 50 which I think is quite cheap for a riding lesson.We don't have to muck out our horses but we saddle them up and in autumn and winter lead then into the riding shed which is a large warehouse with a mud floor.In the spring and summer we ride in the fields. The stables are always clean and have fresh hay and the horses and ponies are clean and well cared for.Some of the horses are called Ben,Flake,Jade and Sunny. I like going riding there because all the teachers are very kind and if any pupil is frightened they help a lot.It is a really nice place with a happy atmosphere and so you have to book well in advance because it is very busy.I love animals and when I sit on a horse I feel that I'm on top of the world!
